verses.text: O sing unto the \sc Lord\sc* a new song: Sing unto the \sc Lord\sc*, all the earth.
Sing unto the \sc Lord\sc*, bless his name; Shew forth his salvation from day to day.
Declare his glory among the heathen, His wonders among all people.
For the \sc Lord\sc* \add is\add* great, and greatly to be praised: He \add is\add* to be feared above all gods.
For all the gods of the nations \add are\add* idols: But the \sc Lord\sc* made the heavens.
Honour and majesty \add are\add* before him: Strength and beauty \add are\add* in his sanctuary.
Give unto the \sc Lord\sc*, O ye kindreds of the people, Give unto the \sc Lord\sc* glory and strength.
Give unto the \sc Lord\sc* the glory due unto his name: Bring an offering, and come into his courts.
O worship the \sc Lord\sc* in the beauty of holiness: Fear before him, all the earth.
Say among the heathen \add that\add* the \sc Lord\sc* reigneth: The world also shall be established \add that\add* it shall not be moved: He shall judge the people righteously.
Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.
Let the field be joyful, and all that \add is\add* therein: Then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
Before the \sc Lord\sc*, for he cometh, For he cometh to judge the earth: He shall judge the world with righteousness, And the people with his truth.
